mapper.select: SELECT * FROM covid_vaccine_center WHERE (LAT BETWEEN (#{param1}-0.045) AND (#{param1}+0.045)) AND (LNG BETWEEN (#{param2}-0.055) AND (#{param2}+0.055))
SELECT * FROM covid_vaccine_center_temp WHERE (LAT BETWEEN (#{param1}-0.045) AND (#{param1}+0.045)) AND (LNG BETWEEN (#{param2}-0.055) AND (#{param2}+0.055))
